description: The ability to set challenging, but realistic goals and deliver feedback well is critical to your success as a leader. Bring an open mind for improving your ability to communicate performance expectations as a leader and help your team achieve higher motivation and productivity. Learn how to set performance expectations, communicate them, and provide positive and constructive feedback to maximize performance. This 30 minute course includes downloadable templates and job aids for reviewing an writing goals, tips on providing effective feedback, practicing your communications skills and creating an action plan for your success.
title: Setting Powerful Performance Expectations
